dict.acceptation: 后面的，其次的；下列的；顺风的；
崇拜者，拥护者；下列，如下；跟随；随球；

sent.orig: Definitions. In this Agreement the following terms the following meaning the context clearly requires otherwise.
sent.trans: 定义。本协议中，除上下文明显另有所指外，下列术语含义如下。

sent.orig: Following such research way, author constructs the article as the following.
sent.trans: 本着这样的研究路线，笔者对本论文的结构做如下安排：第一章绪论。

sent.orig: Also, the following error is discussed, showing that the designed trailer has good following performance.
sent.trans: 采用该方法设计的列车，具有良好的跟随性。

sent.orig: Specifies the following conditions for the post-build event to run, as shown in the following table.
sent.trans: 要使后期生成事件能够运行，请指定以下条件（如下表中所示）。

sent.orig: Mainly divided into the following broad categories: high-temperature battery, low battery, long-life battery and power battery.
sent.trans: 主要分为以下几大类：高温电池，低温电池，长寿命电池以及动力电池。
